name: Anonbot
description: Anonbot is a unique new bridging and mixing tool built on Telegram and leveraging existing cross-chain technology to give users a best-in-class and easy-to-use bridging and mixing tool. With just a few clicks, one can easily swap, bridge, mix or simultaneously swap, bridge and mix tokens at market competitive transaction fees. Leveraging both the momentum of Telegram-based DeFi tools, as well as the growing need for privacy-enhancing products, Anonbot aims to create the go-to mixing and bridging tool. Our bot and platform offers competitive prices and a superior set of options, enabling investors to simultaneously swap, bridge and mix tokens in just a few seconds and without the need for a computer.
